EmailTemplate.name: Email 1 - AG Link and Magazine
EmailTemplate.subject: Your 2016 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.ACDF_FName__c},
Now that you have officially been named a 2016 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}, I’d like to share more details about the special section that will appear in the{!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}. We can also help determine the best way to share the good news about your award.
I’ll follow up with you in a couple of days. In the meantime, you can:
Check out last year's award section for a better idea of how award winners are featured Review the award guide to find out more about the award and the marketing tools available to you
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
